Tech for Non Tech 💻🌏

Apr 1, 2020

  • civictech
  • episode
  • code for all
  • tech for non tech

Lina Patel of Code for Australia and Nao Myoshu of Code for Japan join us for a conversation about Tech for Non Tech, a Code for All educational program. We’ll talk about what the program is, why it exists, and dig into the details of how it’s been shared across the network.
